text: Pascal Clément (12 May 1945 - 21 June 2020) was a French politician. He was a member of the Union pour un Mouvement Populaire (UMP).National Assembly profile He was a member of the National Assembly of France from 1978 to 1993, from 1995 to 2005 and from 2007 to 2012. He was Minister of Parliamentary Relations from 1993 to 1995, and Minister of Justice from 2005 to 2007. He was born in Boulogne-Billancourt, France. Clément died on 21 June 2020 in Paris from a lung infection, aged 75. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Boulogne-Billancourt
title: Pascal Clément
